Hello Shankly
I know this link, but I think in future upploads, it's easier to find new torrents from you, If I have add you to my favorite links, I give you an example right here:

http://thepiratebay.org/user/FEFE2003

Keaneolle: I talked to some guys on #thepiratebay.org and there is apparently a bug in the /user/ feature that prevents it from working with usernames containing spaces... It doesnt allow %20 or + as arguments in a string.

We must hope that Shankly continues to include his name when naming and describing his torrents, so we can find them through a search on "shankly" :)

Keaneolle: Messed around a bit with the help of IRC guys and found another way of doing exactly the same thing as using the /user/ feature.

Do a search with the following string:
uploader: ("Shanklys Love Child")

or bookmark this page;
http://thepiratebay.org/search.php?q=uploader%3A+%28%22Shanklys+Love+Child%22%29

Now you wont miss any Shankly torrents :p
